column3: Ana ɔfa mbra mu dɛ obi gyina asɛm biara do gyaa ne yer awar?"

Iyi ntsi na ɔbanyin begya n'egya nye ne na hɔ
column4: na ɔdze noho akɛbata ne yer ho; na hɔn beenu ayɛ honankor?"

column2: "Dɛm no na wɔnnda ho nnyɛ beenu bio
column3: na wɔyɛ honankor. Ntsi dza Nyankopɔn dze abɔ mu no
Na ɔyɛ dɛn na Moses hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmma ɔbaa no awargyaa krataa na wongyaa no yi?"
Hom akoma dzen ntsi na Moses maa hom kwan dɛ hom ngyaa hom yernom
column4: na ofi ahyɛse no dze nna ɔnntse dɛm."

column2: "Binom wɔ hɔ a wɔwoo hɔn fii hɔn na yamu dɛ mma wɔnnwar; na binom so wɔ hɔ a nyimpa yɛɛ hɔn ma wɔnnwar; na binom so wɔ hɔ a sor ahendzi no ntsi wɔnnwar.     Nyia obotum agye no

column5: na woyinom dɛm na sor ahenman no yɛ hɔndze."
